name: Life of Cat
description:
With the help of this tutorial: https://scottlilly.com/learn-c-by-building-a-simple-rpg-index I decided to relearn C# (Not like I was ever great at it) and make a very very simple game.

This is a simple text based RPG where you play as a cat, exploring the neighbourhood.

You'll encounter friends and foes, quests and treats.

This is still a work in progress, I am unsure how much I will actually develop this, but so far so good in my oppinion.
